title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
Welcome to R/Pharma 2025

 

R/Pharma 2025 - Icons by Lordicon.com

title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
Housekeeping


General Guidelines

Terms and conditions - check the website at https://rinpharma.com/terms.html
R/Pharma is a non-commercial conference. Vendors are welcome to attend but as practitioners, not salespeople
Please be patient with us - hosting a virtual conference is different 

Asking for help

Reach out in the conference chat
Slack: reach out in the #help-me channel in rinpharmaconf (rinpharmaconf.slack.com)
Contact form on rinpharma.com
Email to info@rinpharma.com

title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
What is R/Pharma?


Volunteer organization of passionate R pactitioners in the Pharmaceutical and Biotech industries
This is our Annual Conference

Workshops, keynotes, talks and panels
Fun stuff in the breaks
Started in 2018 (In person 2018, 2019. Virtual from 2020)

Want to help? Join our community

email info@rinpharma.com to contribute
keep in touch through social media

We’ve been busy in 2025…

title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
R/Pharma 2025


SDTM Workshop (200+ attendees)
R/Pharma summit @ posit::conf 2025 (Sep 15)

Over 100 representatives from 45+ companies contributed to discussions on R and open source in Pharma and biotech
Notes available on R/Pharma website

R/Pharma Diversity Alliance

Hackathon - introducing new contributors to open source

R/Pharma Hangouts
Second R/Pharma genAI Day (Aug 19, 700+ attendees)

Check R/Pharma website or YouTube channel for recordings.

New R/Pharma website (https://rinpharma.com/)

title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
R/Pharma APAC Track


Second year running a scientific track for both EU/US and APAC.
Almost 24 hours of R/Pharma!!!
Daniel Sabanés Bové and APAC organizing committee managing APAC track

keynotes, plus Europe/US keynote replays followed by discussion panels
presentations
workshops

Presentations from both APAC and Europe/US will be available in our YouTube channel after R/Pharma

title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
Brian Bole Award of Excellence


Brian Bole was an innovator and thought leader in the healthcare and life sciences space, working with R and an early adopter of shiny
The Brian Bole Award of Excellence is presented annually in recognition of outstanding achievements in open source life sciences
Brian Bole Award has previously been awarded to:

{admiral} development team
Novo Nordisk submissions team
R Consortium Submissions Working Group

This year we’re proud to present it to the Daniel Sjoberg and the {gtsummary} team for helping propel groups towards open source submissions

title: R/Pharma 2025
text:
